data.eml:eml: Review of the African catfish genus Andersonia (Teleostei: Siluriformes)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ferraris, Carl J., Vari, Richard P. (2012): Review of the African catfish genus Andersonia (Teleostei: Siluriformes). Zootaxa 3210: 39-49, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280207
